title: Vignettes Mash-Up
description:
Compilation mod pack for the {{Y|Caves of Qud Modding Jam: Vignettes}}, ran during March 2024. See all the entries at {{C|https://itch.io/jam/caves-of-qud-modding-jam-2/entries}}!

Wish for 'modjampack' or press ctrl-shift-W (can be re-mapped under Key Mappings > Debug > Mod Jam Wish Menu) to open a menu for easy wishing for the pack's contents.

{{W|Warning:}} Do not run this pack simultaneous with any of the mods contained within.
author: Mod Jam Participants and Organizers
